document_data.name: Theriheb
document_data.mainbody: '''Theriheb''' was a [[paladin]] of [[Osiris]] in [[Mulhorand]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1357 DR]], Theriheb went to participate in the tournament held in [[Mourktar]] in [[Threskel]] to choose the new king. He managed to finish among the tournament's finalists.
document_data.Personality: Theriheb was an honorable man and a fierce warrior.
document_data.Relationship: Theriheb was a cousin of the current incarnation of Osiris.
